channel.description: Recent content in Shark Week on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Paul de Gelder’s Unlikely Path From a Near-Fatal Attack to ‘Shark Week’ Stardom
item.description: He was an Australian Navy clearance diver when he nearly died in a bullhead shark attack. This year, he taunts them on Discovery Channel with a series of stunts in his 10th year with the TV event.

item.title: Paul de Gelder’s Unlikely Path From a Near-Fatal Attack to ‘Shark Week’ Stardom
item.description: He was an Australian Navy clearance diver when he nearly died in a bullhead shark attack. This year, he taunts them on Discovery Channel with a series of stunts in his 10th year with the TV event.

item.title: The Enduring Popularity of ‘Shark Week,’ Discovery’s Secret Ratings Weapon
item.description: Now a bonanza of viewership, the 37-year-old event that launched as a meager presentation of 10 basic programs and has also courted detractors over the years.

item.title: The Enduring Popularity of ‘Shark Week,’ Discovery’s Secret Ratings Weapon

item.title: ‘Shark Week’ 2025 Is Here: Everything to Know About Discovery’s 37th Annual Event
item.description: The cult-favorite TV event returns for a week of programming dedicated to the beloved sea creatures. Here’s the complete schedule and how to catch all the action.

item.title: Shark Week 2025 Brings New Thrills and Old Favorites to Discovery
item.description: The enduringly popular Discovery Channel summertime TV event is back for its 37th year.
